translations.translation: Have you thought about the fire that you light?
Consider the fire that you strike (and get by friction).
Did you consider the fire which you kindle?
Have you seen the fire which you kindle?
So what is your opinion regarding the fire which you kindle?
Do you not see the fire which you kindle.
Have you considered the fire which you strike?
Have you considered the fire you kindle?
Have ye observed the fire which ye strike out;
Have you thought about the fire that you kindle.
Behold! - the fire which ye strike out:
Have you considered the fire that you kindle?
See ye the Fire which ye kindle?
Tell Me! The fire which you kindle,
Have you thought about the fire you kindle?
Have you seen the fire you kindle?
And have you seen the fire that you ignite?
[56:71] Have you considered the fire that you kindle?, [the fire] which you produce out of the [oil of] green trees?
(Have ye observed the Fire which ye strike out) from every dry twig except for the twigs of the Jujube tree;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِي تُورُونَ } أي تَسجرون
 يقال أوريتُ، ووريتُ
